name: Canvia
0:
”Alexa ask can via to show my favorite playlists”
”Alexa ask can via to show my favorite artists”
”Alexa ask can via to show my favorite artworks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: can via
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Canvia skill frees you from having to use your phone or a desktop app to control your Canvia art frame. You can ask your frame to show your favorite playlists, artists or artworks. You can also find a playlist, artist or artwork by name. You can also change the frequency of playback as well as pause, show previous or show next.

You will enjoy your Canvia art frame so much more now that you can interact with it using just your voice
